detail_desc: Sports trousers in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric with a drawstring at the top and side pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Earrings in metal with rings in different sizes. Length 6 cm.
Bolero in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads. Button at the neckline and long sleeves with roll edges at the cuffs.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that split into two at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, sleeveless, flared dress in a double layer of mesh with an opening and button at the back of the neck, seam at the hips and a wide, gathered flounce. Lined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and elastication and a wide flounce around the neckline. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless top in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a sweetheart neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with three printed pairs. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Oversized shirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Blouse in a cotton crêpe weave with a grandad collar, button placket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem, longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top and long sleeves with a slit and covered button at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with pleats, a concealed zip at the back, and slits at the front. Unlined.

Block-coloured windbreaker in woven fabric with a high collar and lined, detachable hood with a hook and loop strap. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt side pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed cuffs and hems.
BABY EXCLUSIVE. Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a picot trim at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Paper straw hat with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a bow at the front and a grosgrain trim around the top. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Cap in woven fabric containing some wool with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Thin, textured metal earrings in various sizes and designs.
Longer cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, buttons down the front and front pockets. Ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.

Short coat in woven fabric in a gently flared style with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves with a narrow tab and button at the cuffs, welt side pockets and a single back vent with a box pleat. Unlined.
Padded gilet with imitation leather details, a stand-up collar and detachable hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, gathered elastication at the bust and a seam at the waist. Long sleeves with gathered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Set with a hat, scarf and pair of gloves in a soft fine knit. Hat with a pompom on top and turn-up at the hem. Gloves with ribbed cuffs. Scarf with fringes along the short sides.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover funnel collar, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish, turtle neck and long sleeves.
Skirt in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the waist. Unlined.
Jumper in a fine knit with ribbing around the neckline and hem, and long sleeves with ribbed roll edges.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, one with a small, decorative metal pendant.
Padded jacket in a coated weave with a padded drawstring hood and small stand-up collar.  Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lining in a contrasting colour.
Knee-length, A-line skirt in a sturdy weave with a slight sheen. High waist and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbing at the cuffs.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Short raglan sleeves and reflective details.
Wide waist belt in imitation leather with a round metal buckle. Width 8 cm.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and patch front pockets. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in block-coloured cotton jersey. Panel with a text print down the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in a fine-knit cotton blend with soft terry inside and an elasticated waist.
Balconette lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Kaftan in a viscose crêpe weave with a gathered stand-up collar, opening with ties at the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Seam and a tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in superstretch jersey with a slight sheen. Low, elasticated waist with a decorative button, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Wide pyjama bottoms in softly draping satin with narrow elastication at the waist and straight legs with high slits in the sides.
Short, gently fitted dress in washed, stretch denim with a V-neck and buttons down the front.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a square neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Hi-top canvas trainers with a padded shaft, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved dress in crinkled jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Side pockets and a seam at the waist with pleats at the front and gentle gathers at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front.
Longer cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with tie-top shoulder straps, decorative gathers at the front, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Double layer at the top. Unlined.
V-neck top in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, concealed zip at the back, tapered waist and pleated flare to the hem. Lined.

Soft nursing top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and functional fastening for easier nursing access. Integral soft top with an elasticated hem. Can be used both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a square, covered buckle. Width 4 cm.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Regular waist with wide elastication and a key pocket in the waistband.
Fine-knit trainer socks with decorative elasticated lace at the top.
Kaftan in soft, airy jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Sleeveless top in airy linen jersey with a deep V-neck at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with gathers in the sides for a comfortable fit.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline with pleats front and back, and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Joggers in light, patterned sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a tie containing glittery threads at the waist and ribbed hems.
Cigarette trousers in a viscose weave with a regular waist with that is elasticated at the back, side pockets and tapered legs with grosgrain side stripes.
Fully lined swimsuit with cut-out sections front and back, a racer back and high-cut legs.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves, hole-patterned sections at the sides and reflective details.
Round hair clip in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter 4.5 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with pointed toes, a zip on the inside and a loop on the other side. Cotton twill linings and insoles. Heel 3 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Bandeau bra in smocked cotton jersey with a small overlocked frill trim top and bottom and no fasteners.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Reflective detail on the sleeves, thumbholes at the cuffs and a gently rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
